hero.title: EXCLUSIVE PLAST
hero.subtitle: High Quality Plastic Products Manufacturer
hero.description: With modern technologies and a professional team, we fully meet customer needs

about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: On the path of quality and innovation
about.historyText1: Exclusive Invest Industry company started its operations in 2005 and achieved unprecedented success in a short time. The 'EXCLUSIVE PLAST' brand is one of the largest manufacturers of plastic products in Uzbekistan.
about.historyText2: Thanks to our own production, we offer our products at lower prices than market prices. However, this does not affect the quality of our products. All products have quality system certificates issued by Uzstandart authorities and fully comply with international standards.
about.historyText3: 'Exclusive Plast' company is considered one of the leading companies in Uzbekistan and CIS countries. Today, our company delivers its products to the world market based on export contracts with several countries.
about.historyText4: Every year, our company's specialists visit foreign countries for professional development and experience exchange. To date, more than 200 qualified employees work in our company.
about.qualityDesc: High quality is our main principle

home.aboutTitle: EXCLUSIVE PLAST - Guarantee of Quality and Reliability
home.aboutDesc: Since 2005, we have been operating in the field of plastic products manufacturing. One of the leading companies in Uzbekistan and CIS countries.
home.productsDesc: We produce more than 30 types of products and manufacture special products to order
home.certificatesDesc: All products are certified by Uzstandart authorities and meet international standards
home.contactDesc: If you have any questions or suggestions, contact us
home.name: Your Name

products.title: Products

services.title: Services
services.subtitle: Wide Range of Professional Services
services.customProductionDesc: Production of individual products according to customer requirements. Using modern technologies, we fulfill orders of any complexity.
services.deliveryDesc: We provide logistics throughout Uzbekistan and organize exports through our own logistics system.
services.consultationDesc: Our specialists will help you choose the most suitable product and answer all technical questions.
services.qualityControlDesc: All products undergo strict quality control during production and meet international standards.
services.equipmentDesc: We use the latest technologies and high-quality equipment

footer.about: EXCLUSIVE PLAST - one of the largest manufacturers of plastic products in Uzbekistan. In the market since 2005.
